title: All-Time Draft Classes with Ricky Smith
itunes:title: All-Time Draft Classes with Ricky Smith
description:
Miles and Jack were joined by comedian, tv writer and founder of Random Acts of Kindness Everywhere, Ricky Smith to discuss the recent NBA draft as well as some of their all-time favorite NBA Draft classes.

Help Spread Kindness Around The World

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
